item.title: CVE-2024-32098|2024-04-15T07:39:07.547Z -- Page Visit Counter -- Advanced Page Visit Counter
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Special Elements used in an SQL Command ('SQL Injection') vulnerability in Page Visit Counter Advanced Page Visit Counter.This issue affects Advanced Page Visit Counter: from n/a through 8.0.6.
